comments.comment: Very true.  But basically Dasun's wife has done a blunder. Nobody can keep a man adamantly. If Dasun needs to go she should have released him. Now what did she achieve??? Childhood love affairs may not last long. I am telling on my own experience. Very sad.

"‡∂î‡∂∫ ‡∑Ä‡∑ê‡∂Ø‡∑í ‡∂∂‡∂± ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂ú‡∑ö ‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂ª‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∑è‡∑Ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂Ø‡∂ß ‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è" kathawa sahathika aththa Kasun obata dis agree dapu hamotama kiyanne thamunla nodannawa unata Dayan kiyanne hoda charithayakma nome. emenma dayan Dasune amma gana vitharai kiyala thiyenne birida gana mukuthma ne. adaraneeya putheku nathi una vitharada biridata ahimi une allapu gedara minihawada Dayan?
Man stop finding faults in everybody, you know there ain't any perfect people in this society, at least Dayan has a compassionate heart while you are spilling hatred.
Ehema nan u suicide karagan na bn thawa ekak set kara gani. Mu rawatuna.

Mama mage jivithe therum gatta deyak thamai...adara wanthayan athara athiwena adare (gf / bf / wife / husband) - vividakara awashyatha sampoorna kara ganna hada ganna ewa..ema awashyatha psychological, emotional, se*ual, social and financial kiyana hamaekakama combination ekak...oya kiyana "true love " (saba adare/nirmala premaya/awanka adare/sansara gatha premaya - oya hama ekama) kiyana eka ape system eka (body and mind) hormones walin koloppan unama ibetama hadena manasika thathwayak...aurudu ganak ekata hitiyath okama thamai wenne...se*ual needs nathi unath anith 4 nisa ekata innawa..api mewa gana udu hithin hithanne nathi wenna puluwan..eth yati hitha apiwa me awasyatha sapura ganna yomu karanawa..e wagema thamai mewa sapiren nathi unama, yati hithenma apiwa ath karanawa..mewa dan science walatath hoyagena thinne...ewa hodata vistara karala science articles and documentry wala thinawa..eth ithin mewa budu hamuduruwo aurudu 2500 kata kalin deshana karapuwa..
Shalini set une Dasun famous unata passe, Shalini nisa Dasun famous una kiyana eka waradi.
Pau yako. Umba moda wada karalama nadda kiyapn ko?
kiyai at..2 thama..

Hama param parawama kare wath man param parawata banala..athithe ayata hoda kiyapu eka thamai.....kaud danne athitheth me wagema kattiya siya divi hani kara gattad nadd kiyala...dan wage tv,radio,internet wage thorathuru huwa maru kara ganna ewa thibbe na ne..thawa ekak jana gahane wadi nisa wena suicide ganath wadi wenawa (ekama percentage eken suicide kara gattath)..e kiyanne apita wadi wara gana nak suicide ahenawa..anith hethuwa thamai jivithe kalinta wada complex..issara hitiya ayata wada apita manasikawa ena pressure eka wadi...ithin hama dama wage apith athitheta hoda kiyala wartha maneta banala wadak na..budu hamuduruwo deshana kale siyalla wenas wena sului kiyala...ithin sinduth ohomai..kalawath ohomai
machan umba mara kathawak ban kiyanne.sahathika aththa ...
Well said Dayan I always respect you and I fully agreed with you

Thank you for this wise message to all people, young or old, foreign emotionally labile and make mothers/,parents or loved ones to drown in never ending despair.They should be taught about fidelity in marriage, too.

Dan kenek ta kiyanna puluwan.."aiyoo owada mata awa prashna ..ithin mama ellenna ona katath kalin" kiyala.eyalata kiyanna wenne meka - api kiri thekak hadu wothin ekama warge cup 10 kata , eka cup ekata eka eka sareta ,ekama ingredients dammath,ekama pudgalaya haduwath the 10 eka vidihata haden na..ekaka seeni wadi ,anike thawa ekak..e wage thamai ape brain ekath eka ekata wenas vidihata hadila thinne..anika ape DNA wenas...oya godak ewa nisa ekama prashneta ape brain eka wada karana vidiha wenas..Dasunge brain eka oyata thibunath ekama thirane thamai ganne..nikan api hamoma pora talk dunnata..karanna thina ekama de thamai MENTAL HEALTH GANA AWARNESS EKA SAMAJE ATHI KARANA EKA..API APE WATE INNA API ADARE KARANA AYA GANA HODA AWADANEN INNA EKA..bana kiyala hari yanna..budu hamuduruwo darme deshana karanna kalin ..pata sharawath hari mental states ekata gatta.

Me mahattaya me de kiyanne hoda hithin bawa atta...eth metana wena de gana hari wata heemak na me mahattayata.. kenekta manasika peedanaya wadi unama depression walata watenawa...etha kota mole rational thinking karana kotasa thawakalikawa ada pana weemak wenawa...etha kota amma tatta, prashna visada ganna vidi oluwe sidda wen na..eka hariyata nikan sathekta ganan hadanna kiyanawa wage..sathata e part eka na brain eke..(methanadi e manussayage e brain part eka wada karan na)..oya okkoma darshanika matha kiyanna puluwan hoda sihiyen inna api hamotama...eth ape oluwath oya kiyana state ekata awoth oka thamai wenne

good one dayan....need more people like you who can touch the hearts of the younger generation.We need to teach them and support them in difficult times. When they become selfish, they take these stupid decisions. They need to think that once they take their life...the people who suffer most is their parents and immediate family.
